intro: Chirita zollingeri, commonly known as Zollinger's ivy, is a species of flowering plant in the family Gesneriaceae. It is native to tropical regions of Central and South America, where it typically grows as a vine or shrub. Due to its ornamental value, it is occasionally cultivated as a houseplant.
